About

Rapidly prototype a pop up chat window UI inside SugarCRM app, generate demo content of a chat window.

The purpose of this prototype is to demonstrate how SugarCRM app user is notified via UI feedback based on how happy or unhappy a customer on the other line is.

Date: August 2016

Patent(s): US20170010759A1

Technologies used: n/a

Role: UX Engineer

Interactive prototype
